      • readToken

        public static java.lang.String readToken()
                                  throws java.io.IOException,
                                         TokenNotFoundException
        Attempts to read the token from the Token File. If the file didn't exist previously, it is created and a TokenNotFoundException is thrown.
        Returns:
        A String of the token used for the bot
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Failed IO action
        TokenNotFoundException - Token file does not exist
